appendix.title: Limits and Shortcomings
appendix.para: As all products, ArgoUML has some limits. Those important to the user are listed in this section.

sect1.title: Diagram Canvas Size
sect1.para: Due to the underlying diagram editing software, the canvas size for diagrams is limited to 6000 units in height and width.

sect1.title: Missing functions
sect1.para: For the 0.14 release the sequence diagrams are disabled. It will be replace by a new and improved version in the upcoming release. In the 0.12 release they were not working and in the 0.10 release they did not follow the UML specification correctly.
